ConditionDescription: Very nice condition in my opinion.  Please view all pictures to form your own opinion.
Title: Honora Pearl Multi Color Ringed Sterling Silver Necklace & Bracelet Set   QVC
Description: Beautiful set by Honora Pearl. The set is well made, substantial weight on the pearls. They are cultured freshwater pearls. The necklace measures 20" in length. The clasp is called a "rocker" clasp. It is marked 924 H on the side, and is a base metal on the bottom. You push in one side of the clasp on the bottom and the pin slides out. Very easy to do. The set has three matching stretch bracelets that measure 7" in length. As mentioned on QVC: Expect first-rate quality. As one of the largest distributors of Chinese cultured freshwater pearls in the U.S., Honora offers extraordinary value. Please email me with any questions. PAYMENT & SHIPPING DETAILS: Upon ending of auction, please make payment through paypal. I do not accept ECHECKS as payment. If for some reason you will not be able to pay in a timely manner, please let me know to avoid a case being opened for non-payment. Communication is the best way to avoid any issues. Your package will be mailed through the United States Postal Service by priority mail. It comes with a tracking number as well as insurance. I ship only throughout the United States. I will post your tracking number upon my return from the post office. ALL SALES ARE FINAL. PLEASE BE SURE TO READ THE ENTIRE LISTING BEFORE PURCHASING / BIDDING. I LIST EACH ITEM IN DETAIL GIVING MY OWN OPINION AND SUGGESTING THAT YOU LOOK OVER ALL THE PICTURES TO FORM YOUR OWN OPINION. WHAT IS EXCELLENT TO ME, MIGHT BE JUST "OK" TO YOU.
